Right to Repair 🛠️

Aug 11, 2021

  • civictech
  • episode
  • public policy
  • right to repair
  • government
  • legislation

Ryan Koch talks Right to Repair. We’ll chat through what it’s about, why it’s important, and some legislation that’s out there being considered.
